EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Driving Real Insights Through Data Science_Q415.Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our Driving Real Insights Through Data Science event. It was a great turnout and we appreciated your input and participation. We hope you left with fresh ideas and real-world knowledge to help you on your big data journey.
We wanted to make the presentation slides <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/driving-real-insights-through-data-science> available to you and invite you to gain additional insights from resources like these handouts on Advancing Big Data in Research <http://pivotal.io/big-data/datasheet/advancing-big-data-in-research> and Pharmaceutical Manufacturing <http://pivotal.io/big-data/datasheet/advancing-big-data-in-pharmaceutical-manufacturing>.
Your feedback is important, please complete a short survey here <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/DataScienceBridgewater>.
Please contact us <http://pivotal.io/contact> to schedule a follow up meeting with our team and learn how Pivotal Big Data Suite <https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> can help transform your organization.
For upcoming events, visit us here <http://pivotal.io/news-events/#events>. We look forward to seeing you soon!
The Pivotal Team
